content:
Large-Scale System Management

  • Mission-critical, but diverse

    DNS, email/web/file/app service, institution-wide;
    for "regular" folk, contractors, customers, alumni, etc

  • Enterprise Identity Management

    identity is a collection of attributes,
    a collection of relationships with ID-defining systems
    as few identities as possible, but no fewer ...

  • Architecture: diverse data synchronization

    "meta-directory":
       heterogeneous managed links to diverse systems,
       not homogeneous linked DS services;
    also highly-managed linkages to external partners

    •  

    rlmorgan@ washington.edu [next | top]
    TWIST '99
